title: Who, what, when, where, why
title_cn: 谁，什么，何时，何地，为什么

title: AFMs feel the force, quantum dots meet magnetic nanoparticles, solar cells turn to organic dyes, nanocarriers learn lessons from viruses, and more.
title_cn: 原子力显微镜会感到力量，量子点会遇到磁性纳米粒子，太阳能电池会变成有机染料，纳米载体会从病毒中吸取教训，等等。

title: Top down bottom up: Golden share
title_cn: 自上而下自下而上：黄金股

title: Self-organized nanotube serpentines
abstract: Carbon nanotubes have unique mechanical, electronic, optical and thermal properties, which make them attractive building blocks in the field of nanotechnology. However, their organization into well-defined straight or curved geometries and arrays on surfaces remains a critical challenge for their integration into functional nanosystems. Here we show that combined surface- and flow-directed growth enable the controlled formation of uniquely complex and coherent geometries of single-walled carbon nanotubes, including highly oriented and periodic serpentines and coils. We propose a mechanism of non-equilibrium self-organization, in which competing dissipative forces of adhesion and aerodynamic drag induce oscillations in the nanotubes as they adsorb on the surface. Our results demonstrate the use of ‘order through fluctuations’ to shape nanostructures into complex geometries. The nanotube serpentines and loops are shown to be electrically conducting and could therefore find a wide range of potential applications, such as receiving and transmitting antennas, heating and cooling elements, optoelectronic devices and single-molecule dynamos.
abstract_cn: 碳纳米管具有独特的机械，电子，光学和热学性质，使其成为纳米技术领域中有吸引力的基础。然而，将它们组织成表面上明确定义的笔直或弯曲的几何形状和阵列仍然是将它们集成到功能纳米系统中的关键挑战。在这里，我们表明，结合表面和流动导向的生长，可以控制形成单壁碳纳米管的独特复杂且一致的几何形状，包括高度定向和周期性的蛇纹石和线圈。我们提出了一种非平衡自组织的机制，其中粘附力和空气动力阻力的竞争性耗散力在纳米管吸附到表面上时引起纳米管振荡。我们的结果证明了通过波动使用＆＃8216;将纳米结构成形为复杂的几何形状。纳米管的蛇形结构和环具有导电性，因此可以找到广泛的潜在应用，例如接收和发送天线，加热和冷却元件，光电器件和单分子发电机。

title: Terahertz time-domain measurement of ballistic electron resonance in a single-walled carbon nanotube
title_cn: 单壁碳纳米管中弹道电子共振的太赫兹时域测量
abstract: Understanding the physics of low-dimensional systems and the operation of next-generation electronics will depend on our ability to measure the electrical properties of nanomaterials at terahertz frequencies (∼100 GHz to 10 THz). Single-walled carbon nanotubes are prototypical one-dimensional nanomaterials because of their unique band structure and long carrier mean free path. Although nanotube transistors have been studied at microwave frequencies (100 MHz to 50 GHz), no techniques currently exist to probe their terahertz response. Here, we describe the first terahertz electrical measurements of single-walled carbon nanotube transistors performed in the time domain. We observe a ballistic electron resonance that corresponds to the round-trip transit of an electron along the nanotube with a picosecond-scale period. The electron velocity is found to be constant and equal to the Fermi velocity, showing that the high-frequency electron response is dominated by single-particle excitations rather than collective plasmon modes. These results demonstrate a powerful new tool for directly probing picosecond electron motion in nanostructures.
abstract_cn: 了解低维系统的物理原理和下一代电子设备的操作将取决于我们在太赫兹频率（＆＃8764; 100 GHz至10 THz）下测量纳米材料电性能的能力。单壁碳纳米管是典型的一维纳米材料，因为它们具有独特的能带结构和较长的载流子平均自由程。尽管已经在微波频率（100到100到50到650 GHz）上研究了纳米管晶体管，但目前尚不存在探测其太赫兹响应的技术。在这里，我们描述了在时域中执行的单壁碳纳米管晶体管的首次太赫兹电测量。我们观察到弹道电子共振，该共振对应于电子沿着皮秒级周期沿着纳米管的往返传输。发现电子速度是恒定的并且等于费米速度，这表明高频电子响应由单粒子激发而不是集体等离子体激元模式主导。这些结果证明了一种直接探测纳米结构中皮秒电子运动的强大工具。

title: Intrinsic and extrinsic performance limits of graphene devices on SiO2
title_cn: 石墨烯器件在SiO2上的本征和非本征性能限制
abstract: The linear dispersion relation in graphene gives rise to a surprising prediction: the resistivity due to isotropic scatterers, such as white-noise disorder or phonons, is independent of carrier density, n. Here we show that electron–acoustic phonon scattering is indeed independent of n, and contributes only 30 Ω to graphene's room-temperature resistivity. At a technologically relevant carrier density of 1 ×1012 cm−2, we infer a mean free path for electron–acoustic phonon scattering of >2 µm and an intrinsic mobility limit of 2 × 105 cm2 V−1 s−1. If realized, this mobility would exceed that of InSb, the inorganic semiconductor with the highest known mobility (∼7.7 × 104 cm2 V−1 s−1; ref. ) and that of semiconducting carbon nanotubes (∼1 × 105 cm2 V−1 s−1; ref. ). A strongly temperature-dependent resistivity contribution is observed above ∼200 K (ref.); its magnitude, temperature dependence and carrier-density dependence are consistent with extrinsic scattering by surface phonons at the SiO2 substrate and limit the room-temperature mobility to ∼4 × 104 cm2 V−1 s−1, indicating the importance of substrate choice for graphene devices.
abstract_cn: 石墨烯中的线性色散关系引起了令人惊讶的预测：由于各向同性散射（例如白噪声或声子）引起的电阻率与载流子密度n无关。在这里，我们表明电子声子的声子散射确实与n无关，并且仅贡献30％。石墨烯的室温电阻率。在技​​术上相关的载流子密度为1＆＃160;＆＃215; 10 <sup> 12 </ sup>＆＃160; cm <sup>＆＃8722; 2 </ sup>时，我们推断出电子的平均自由程＃8211;声子的声子散射为2＆＃160;＆＃181; m，固有迁移率极限为2＆＃160;＆＃215;＆＃160; 10 <sup> 5 </ sup>＆＃160; cm <sup> 2 </ sup>＆＃160; V <sup>＆＃8722; 1 </ sup>＆＃160; s <sup>＆＃8722; 1 </ sup>。如果实现，则该迁移率将超过InSb，即已知迁移率最高的无机半导体（＆＃8764; 7.7＆＃215; 10 <sup> 4 </ sup>＆＃160; cm <sup> 2 </ sup >＆＃160; V <sup>＆＃8722; 1 </ sup>＆＃160; s <sup>＆＃8722; 1 </ sup>; ref。＆＃160;）和半导体碳纳米管（ ＆＃8764; 1＆＃215; 10 <sup> 5 </ sup>＆＃160; cm <sup> 2 </ sup>＆＃160; V <sup>＆＃8722; 1 </ sup>＆＃ 160; s <sup>＆＃8722; 1 </ sup>; ref。＆＃160;）。在＆＃8764; 200 K（参考）之上观察到强烈的温度依赖性电阻率贡献。它的大小，温度依赖性和载流子密度依赖性与SiO <sub> 2 </ sub>衬底上表面声子的外在散射一致，并将室温迁移率限制为＆＃8764; 4＆＃215;。 10 <sup> 4 </ sup>＆＃160; cm <sup> 2 </ sup>＆＃160; V <sup>＆＃8722; 1 </ sup>＆＃160; s <sup>＆＃8722 ; 1 </ sup>，表明选择衬底对于石墨烯器件的重要性。</ p>

title: Monitoring dopants by Raman scattering in an electrochemically top-gated graphene transistor
title_cn: 通过拉曼散射在电化学顶栅石墨烯晶体管中监测掺杂剂
abstract: The recent discovery of graphene has led to many advances in two-dimensional physics and devices. The graphene devices fabricated so far have relied on SiO2 back gating. Electrochemical top gating is widely used for polymer transistors, and has also been successfully applied to carbon nanotubes. Here we demonstrate a top-gated graphene transistor that is able to reach doping levels of up to 5×1013 cm−2, which is much higher than those previously reported. Such high doping levels are possible because the nanometre-thick Debye layer in the solid polymer electrolyte gate provides a much higher gate capacitance than the commonly used SiO2 back gate, which is usually about 300 nm thick. In situ Raman measurements monitor the doping. The G peak stiffens and sharpens for both electron and hole doping, but the 2D peak shows a different response to holes and electrons. The ratio of the intensities of the G and 2D peaks shows a strong dependence on doping, making it a sensitive parameter to monitor the doping.
abstract_cn: 石墨烯的最新发现导致二维物理和器件方面取得了许多进步。到目前为止，制造的石墨烯器件都依赖SiO 2 背栅。电化学顶部浇口被广泛用于聚合物晶体管，并且也已成功地应用于碳纳米管。在这里，我们演示了一种顶部门控石墨烯晶体管，该晶体管能够达到高达5＆＃215; 10 13 ＆＃160; cm ＆＃8722; 2 的掺杂水平，这比以前报道的要高得多。这样高的掺杂水平是可能的，因为固体聚合物电解质栅极中的纳米级德拜层提供的栅极电容要比通常使用的SiO 2 背栅极要高得多，后者通常约为300nm厚的。拉曼原位测量监测掺杂。对于电子和空穴掺杂，G峰都变硬和变尖，但是2D峰显示出对空穴和电子的不同响应。 G和2D峰的强度比显示出对掺杂的强烈依赖性，使其成为监测掺杂的敏感参数。

title: A pilot toxicology study of single-walled carbon nanotubes in a small sample of mice
title_cn: 少量小鼠单壁碳纳米管的毒理学试验研究
abstract: Single-walled carbon nanotubes are currently under evaluation in biomedical applications, including in vivo delivery of drugs, proteins, peptides and nucleic acids (for gene transfer or gene silencing), in vivo tumour imaging and tumour targeting of single-walled carbon nanotubes as an anti-neoplastic treatment. However, concerns about the potential toxicity of single-walled carbon nanotubes have been raised. Here we examine the acute and chronic toxicity of functionalized single-walled carbon nanotubes when injected into the bloodstream of mice. Survival, clinical and laboratory parameters reveal no evidence of toxicity over 4 months. Upon killing, careful necropsy and tissue histology show age-related changes only. Histology and Raman microscopic mapping demonstrate that functionalized single-walled carbon nanotubes persisted within liver and spleen macrophages for 4 months without apparent toxicity. Although this is a preliminary study with a small group of animals, our results encourage further confirmation studies with larger groups of animals.
abstract_cn: 单壁碳纳米管目前正在生物医学应用中进行评估，包括体内输送药物，蛋白质，肽和核酸（用于基因转移或基因沉默），体内肿瘤成像和单壁碳的肿瘤靶向纳米管作为抗肿瘤治疗。然而，已经提出了关于单壁碳纳米管的潜在毒性的担忧。在这里，我们检查了注入小鼠血流中的功能化单壁碳纳米管的急性和慢性毒性。生存，临床和实验室参数均显示在4个月内无毒性证据。杀死后，仔细的尸检和组织组织学检查仅显示与年龄相关的变化。组织学和拉曼显微作图表明，功能化的单壁碳纳米管在肝脏和脾巨噬细胞内持续存在了4个月，没有明显的毒性。尽管这是对一小群动物的初步研究，但我们的结果鼓励对大群动物进行进一步的确认研究。

title: Dipole-directed assembly of lines of 1,5-dichloropentane on silicon substrates by displacement of surface charge
title_cn: 通过表面电荷的位移在硅衬底上偶极定向组装1,5-二氯戊烷生产线
abstract: One-dimensional nanostructures at silicon surfaces have potential applications in nanoscale devices. Here we propose a mechanism of dipole-directed assembly for the growth of lines of physisorbed dipolar molecules. The adsorbate chosen was a halide, in preparation for the patterned imprinting of halogen atoms. Using scanning tunnelling microscopy, physisorbed 1,5-dichloropentane on Si(100)-2×1 was shown to self-assemble at room temperature into molecular lines that grew predominantly perpendicular to the Si-dimer rows. Line formation was triggered by the displacement of surface charge by the dipolar adsorbate. Experimental and simulated scanning tunnelling microscopy images were in agreement for a range of positive and negative bias voltages. The geometry of the physisorbed molecules and nature of their binding were evident from the scanning tunnelling microscopy images, as interpreted by scanning tunnelling microscopy simulation.
abstract_cn: 硅表面的一维纳米结构在纳米器件中具有潜在的应用。 在这里，我们提出了一种偶极子定向组装的机制，用于物理吸附的偶极子分子的生长。 选择的被吸附物是卤化物，以准备卤原子的图案化印迹。 使用扫描隧道显微镜，显示在Si（100）-2＆＃215; 1上物理吸附的1,5-二氯戊烷在室温下自组装成主要垂直于Si-二聚体行生长的分子线。 线形成是由偶极吸附物置换表面电荷触发的。 实验和模拟扫描隧道显微镜图像在一定范围的正和负偏置电压上是一致的。 从扫描隧道显微镜图像可以看出，物理吸附分子的几何形状及其结合性质很明显。</ p>

title: Reversible electron-transfer reactions within a nanoscale metal oxide cage mediated by metallic substrates
title_cn: 金属基质介导的纳米级金属氧化物笼中的可逆电子转移反应
abstract: Transition metal oxides exhibit a rich collection of electronic properties and have many practical applications in areas such as catalysis and ultra-high-density magnetic data storage. Therefore the development of switchable molecular transition metal oxides has potential for the engineering of single-molecule devices and nanoscale electronics. At present, the electronic properties of transition metal oxides can only be tailored through the irreversible introduction of dopant ions, modifying the electronic structure by either injecting electrons or core holes. Here we show that a molybdenum(VI) oxide ‘polyoxometalate’ molecular nanocluster containing two embedded redox agents is activated by a metallic surface and can reversibly interconvert between two electronic states. Upon thermal activation two electrons are ejected from the active sulphite anions and delocalized over the metal oxide cluster cage, switching it from a fully oxidized state to a two-electron reduced state along with the concomitant formation of an S–S bonding interaction between the two sulphur centres inside the cluster shell.
abstract_cn: 过渡金属氧化物具有丰富的电子特性，在催化和超高密度磁数据存储等领域具有许多实际应用。因此，可切换分子过渡金属氧化物的开发对于单分子器件和纳米级电子学的工程设计具有潜力。目前，只能通过不可逆地引入掺杂离子，通过注入电子或注入空穴来改变电子结构来调整过渡金属氧化物的电子性能。在这里，我们显示了氧化钼（VI）＆＃8216;多金属氧酸盐＆＃8217;。包含两种嵌入的氧化还原剂的分子纳米簇被金属表面激活，并且可以在两个电子状态之间可逆地相互转换。热活化后，两个电子从活性亚硫酸根阴离子中脱出并在金属氧化物簇笼上离域，将其从完全氧化态转换为两电子还原态，并伴随着S＆＃8211; S键之间的相互作用形成。集束壳内的两个硫中心。

title: Structural engineering of nanoporous anodic aluminium oxide by pulse anodization of aluminium
title_cn: 铝的脉冲阳极氧化处理纳米多孔阳极氧化铝的结构工程
abstract: Nanoporous anodic aluminium oxide has traditionally been made in one of two ways: mild anodization or hard anodization. The first method produces self-ordered pore structures, but it is slow and only works for a narrow range of processing conditions; the second method, which is widely used in the aluminium industry, is faster, but it produces films with disordered pore structures. Here we report a novel approach termed “pulse anodization” that combines the advantages of the mild and hard anodization processes. By designing the pulse sequences it is possible to control both the composition and pore structure of the anodic aluminium oxide films while maintaining high throughput. We use pulse anodization to delaminate a single as-prepared anodic film into a stack of well-defined nanoporous alumina membrane sheets, and also to fabricate novel three-dimensional nanostructures.
abstract_cn: 纳米多孔阳极氧化铝传统上以两种方式之一制成：轻度阳极氧化或硬质阳极氧化。 第一种方法可产生有序的孔结构，但速度较慢，并且仅适用于狭窄的加工条件范围。 第二种方法，在铝工业中被广泛使用，速度更快，但是会产生具有无序孔结构的薄膜。 在这里，我们报告了一种称为“脉冲阳极氧化”的新颖方法。 结合了轻度和硬质阳极氧化工艺的优点。 通过设计脉冲序列，可以在保持高通量的同时控制阳极氧化铝膜的组成和孔结构。 我们使用脉冲阳极氧化将单个制备好的阳极膜分层成一堆定义明确的纳米多孔氧化铝膜片，并制造出新颖的三维纳米结构。
